availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Monroe County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth Arterberry. Father of James Arterberry, Benjamin Arterberry, William Arterberry, Alexander Arterberry, Wilson Arterberry, Nancy Arterberry, Lucinda Arterberry, Mary Arterberry, Rosette Arterberry, Bertrand Arterberry, and Sarah Arterberry. Farmer in Monroe County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 391A-391B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 18.
